reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great soap, no plastic bottle
reviews.reviewText: I grew up using bar soap, and realizing that very few plastic bottles ever actually get recycled, I decided it was time to return to simpler times. Although I have used some very nice liquid hand soaps, paying for a plastic bottle that will probably be around long after I’m gone left me feeling guilty. Refillable hand soap bottles are a good idea, but the refill soap usually comes in fairly thick plastic pouch and unless you use a funnel you end up with soap all over the counter…it just seemed like more trouble than I wanted.This bar soap is everything I wanted—great lavender fragrance, lathers well, does not irritate my sensitive skin, and rinses off very easily (faster than any liquid I’ve tried). It leaves my skin feeling slightly moisturized, which is a plus—I have even used it on my face a couple of times with no problem. We are using it in the kitchen as well as the bath now, and it cleans greasy hands better than the liquid soap we used before. All in all, it’s a high quality soap that does what it should and leaves a lovely (but not overpowering) scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this soap to replace Dial Basic - which was discontinued after I’d used it for 30 years. This soap is FAR superior. The bars last nearly twice as long and produce a very rich creamy lather. 100% odor-free and rinses very cleanly and easily. Highly recommended. I wish they’d discontinued Basic a long time ago!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great soap for price!
reviews.reviewText: Will be our basic home soap now. Much better made than store large brands and feels wonderfully emollient and clean. Lathers nicely. Can trust the ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep coming back to this soap
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly, this scent is wonderful. It sounds so simple and boring maybe...a salt smell?But it's delightful and even my kids who are super preferenced with scents request me to continue to get this one.It's not overpowering, but definitely there, an uplifting clean smell. Also love how clean the ingredients are. Really good quality for price and amount. I will keep getting this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love this soap, but it did fall short. I do solidly like it, but there is very little scent and what scent there is, is not at all what I was hoping for. It has more of that vague beeswax-type scent, which isn’t what I was looking for.However it is a very smooth soap that feels great to use, very soft on the skin, and rinses perfectly clean, and on those grounds I’d absolutely buy it again, I would just wish the scent was a little different/better. The bars are smaller than our standard ones, but that’s not a detriment. You won’t go through it that fast, and the benefit is it won’t get gross like a large bar eventually does, and it’s just nicer to use. I use it for bath soap and even replaced my liquid hand soap with it because I like it better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TRADITIONAL FRENCH SOAP WITHOUT HARSH CHEMICALS AND IRRITATING FRAGRANCES
reviews.reviewText: This review is for: Hypoallergenic UnscentedMind that there are different kinds offered here so this is specifically review of UNSCENTED bar.I like soaps that can leave my skin clean and fresh but do not add any irritating chemicals or build up sudsand do not release ton of fragrances that fill shower with unbreathable air.This soap is amazing. It does just the job. It beautifully works on the skin and it leaves my bathroom fragrance free.In the time of allergies it is really perfect soap for those who are concerned about irritating additives and search for plain but dignified elegant products that are connected to the past simple and effective natural thechologies.This soap has a very long tradition and French People trust this brand with their daily hygiene.I have been using it for some 10 years now and never had any problems. The soap is very consistent from bar to bar. There is no variation and it always does the superb job.For those who like fragrance this soap won't deliver but this brand has other soaps in this series that do come in nice natural fragrance collection choices and if I were to seek for fragranced soap I certainly would not hesitate to trust those fragrances as they use natural ingredients.There is something magical when you hold this bar of soap and when you put it on your skin.. it takes you back to France.. to the beautiful plains, vineyards, castles, seashores and ocean side, to the Riviera and to Paris and all over the place. Mind is a magical think because you can close your eyes and imagine that you are being transported to the places that this sap has been born in.. and that's the power of the French Soap .. and your imagination :)...I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS SOAP!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is soap
reviews.reviewText: This soap is unscented, and it makes things clean when you use it. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A LA MAISON Lavender Aloe Bar Soap smells good and it moisturizes well.
reviews.reviewText: I would say these soap bars work well with sensitive skin as long as you do not overuse this product especially during the winter if you have dry skin although I do believe this product should be priced lower.
